entry.title: $1950 // Furn. 1 BR/1 BA Apt, Original Details, Yard, All Utils Incl
entry.content:
SORRY NO PETS, NO SMOKING
AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY

This is a great, well-cared for, clean and beautiful apartment on a safe, quiet block two short blocks from the Nostrand Ave 3 stop. Short walk to Franklin Ave and Prospect Park, etc. Annual lease terms only.

Apt is fully furnished (queen sized bed in the bedroom, pull out couch in the living room). Rent includes all utilities (including wifi, gas, electric). Lots of closet space, wood floors throughout, no smoking/low dust/ low dander, clean environment.

For rent directly from owner, so no brokers fees of any kind are involved. Please let me know if you are interested in viewing, please include a telephone number and a sentence about yourself.

THANK YOU!
